rows.label: qst711201_msg0001
rows.name: I can't find it at all...

rows.label: qst711201_msg0002
rows.name:
That Nopon... he didn't
trick me, did he?!

rows.label: qst711201_msg0003
rows.name: What? What am I so angry about?

rows.label: qst711201_msg0004
rows.name:
This! This treasure map that shows
the location of a treasure!

rows.label: qst711201_msg0005
rows.name:
A Nopon who was selling goods in the
Iiran capital the other day happened
to give it to me for a cheap price.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0006
rows.name:
He insisted, "The treasure
is definitely at that X mark,
mo!", so I just had to.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0007
rows.name:
So I went to the Golden Twin Mesa
just now, but no matter where I
looked, there was nothing.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0008
rows.name:
Well, fake treasure maps aren't
uncommon in Alst these days, so
this map might be one of them...

rows.label: qst711201_msg0009
rows.name:
But if this is real, then maybe
some special skill is needed
to find the treasure...

rows.label: qst711201_msg0010
rows.name:
I'm too frustrated to continue,
so could you somehow find the
treasure on that map for me?

rows.label: qst711201_msg0011
rows.name:
Of course, if you bring me the
treasure, I'll give it to you.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0012
rows.name:
Right now, the truth is more
important to me than the treasure.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0013
rows.name: Well then, I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0101
rows.name: What?! There was treasure?!

rows.label: qst711201_msg0102
rows.name: This is it?!

rows.label: qst711201_msg0103
rows.name:
...I see. That Nopon
was telling the truth.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0104
rows.name:
I was about to resent someone
over a silly misunderstanding.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0105
rows.name: Thank you for finding out the truth.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0106
rows.name: As promised, it's yours.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0201
rows.name:
According to this map, the
treasure is somewhere on
the Golden Twin Mesa.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0202
rows.name:
But if you just walk around the point
marked on the map blindly, I think
you'll find nothing, just like me.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0203
rows.name:
So if you find a suspicious spot,
please search it thoroughly.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0204
rows.name:
Maybe someone among you has the
necessary skill to find the treasure.
